assessments.status_rationale: Deadline is 2025-09-30 and no conclusive performance data versus SPY is provided. Antitrust ruling headlines may affect sentiment, but they do not establish a ≥2 pp outperformance by the close-date window.
Deadline is 2025-10-15 and no comparative price-change data for PEP vs KO is cited in today’s news.
No evidence that DGS30 closed at or above 5.05% yet, and the deadline is 2025-09-30. Macro headlines do not include a qualifying yield print.
CRM fell on guidance while broader tech sentiment was mixed, which supports underperformance risk, but the window runs to 2025-10-15 and no definitive ≥4 pp gap vs QQQ by the end-date is established.
News references U.S. actions against Venezuelan cartels, but there is no cited OFAC press release or list update with new Venezuelan designations. Deadline is 2025-09-30.
No Drewry World Container Index reading is reported. The deadline (on or before 2025-09-26) has not arrived.
August 2025 Core PCE m/m has not been released yet; target window is 0.2%–0.3% by 2025-09-27.
No FedWatch probability snapshot is provided. The threshold (≤20% combined odds for a ≥50 bp cut) could still occur by 2025-09-10.
